(2,): As a system administrator, I want to initialize database tables, so that the application has a proper data structure to work with As a user, I want to create a new submission, so that I can start the data submission process As a user, I want to check the status of my submission, so that I can track its progress As a user, I want to upload a file for processing, so that I can submit my data in FABS or DABS format As a UI designer, I want to update the Resources page design, so that it matches new Broker styles As a user, I want to view FPDS data, so that I can analyze government spending information
(1,): As a user, I want to publish my submission, so that it can be processed and shared with others As a data processor, I want to process FABS files, so that they can be properly validated and stored As a product manager, I want to schedule user testing, so that we can validate UI improvements As a developer, I want to implement proper error handling and logging, so that issues can be quickly identified and resolved As a system administrator, I want to implement New Relic monitoring, so that application performance can be tracked
(0,): As a data manager, I want to sync D1 file generation with FPDS data, so that reports are always up-to-date As a data manager, I want to update funding agency code derivation logic, so that foreign transactions are properly identified As a data manager, I want to update validation rules, so that DUNS and CFDA validations are accurate As a system administrator, I want to process 2017 deletions, so that old, deleted submissions are cleaned up As a data manager, I want to load historical FPDS data, so that we have complete records from 2007 to present As a system administrator, I want to implement file upload validation, so that only valid files are processed As a data manager, I want to update the FABS sample file format, so that it reflects current requirements
